name: radioactivity_concentration_of_253Cf_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Cf" means the element "californium" and "253Cf" is the isotope "californium-253" with a half-life of 1.76e+01 days.
